title: 6Pack(3/3/6/6/6/10 FT) Original [Apple MFi Certified] iPhone Charger Fast Charging Lightning Cable iPhone Charger Cord Compatible with iPhone 14/13/12/11 Pro Max/XS MAX/XR/XS/X/8/7 Plus iPad AirPods
descriptions:
Power up every moment with the 6Pack (3/3/6/6/6/10 FT) Original Apple MFi Certified Lightning Cables—built for speed, safety, and reliability.

Why you’ll love it:
- Certified for trust: Official Apple MFi certification ensures flawless compatibility, safe charging, and seamless syncing with iPhone 14/13/12/11 series, XS/XS Max/XR/X, 8/7/6 lineup, iPad models, and AirPods.
- Faster charging, faster data: Premium copper cores deliver fast charging and speedy data transfer—no pop-ups, no errors, just plug-and-go performance.
- The perfect lengths for every space: 3 ft for on-the-go, 6 ft for the couch or desk, and an ultra-convenient 10 ft for hard-to-reach outlets. Six cables cover your home, office, car, and travel bag.
- Built to last: Reinforced joint design and rigorous bend testing add durability where it matters most, reducing fray and breakage.
- Future-ready: Fully supports current iOS and future updates for long-term peace of mind.
- Worry-free guarantee: Backed by a 1-year refund and replacement promise and responsive customer support within 24 hours.

Upgrade your everyday charging with cables that are dependable, durable, and designed to fit your life—so you’re always powered when it counts.
